page.title: 20Village Changes,Kingsbury.
page.content:
Living in the village 40 years ago one knew all the villagers personally, whereas in recent years so many people ,with jobs outside the area,have settled here that the community as a whole is not so close knit.The appearance of the village has improved ;there are few derelict cottages as these are often attractively renovated.
{CREDITS. The children of Kingsbury Episcopi Primary School,Class 3,compiled these pages from information collected by interview,and by talks given to them by local people,in their working surroundings.The children would like to thank all the parents and other villagers for their kind help.
